hero.description: Give your customers faster, more powerful edge compute with longer requests, more memory, built-in storage, and sub-millisecond performance.

useCases.description: Discover how Fermyon Wasm Functions transform edge computing with these real-world solutions

items.title: Better Than CloudFlare Workers
items.description: A customer wants the speed and features of Cloudflare Workers or Fastly Compute@Edge over Stackit EdgeWorkers.

items.title: AI Applications
items.description: A customer wants to use AI models for text, audio, video, or image generation processes, with easy access to GPUs.

items.title: Mass Redirects
items.description: A customer wants blazingly fast redirects, able to handle millions of rewrite rules, but respond in milliseconds.

items.title: Advanced Bot Detection
items.description: A customer wants to extend Stackit's bot detection solutions, running additional custom logic upon detection.

items.title: Mirroring Traffic Streams
items.description: A customer wants to mirror traffic to an additional destination beyond their origin.

productOverview.description: Fermyon Wasm Functions delivers faster code execution at runtime, extending and accelerating CDNs beyond static caching - enabling dynamic, personalized content and real-time processing at the edge.

performance.heading: Performance Comparison

fermyon.title: Fermyon cuts down the compute time

edge.title: Edge CDN cuts down network time

performance.footnote: These performance advantages enable new edge-native use cases on Stackit, outshining market solutions like Cloudflare Workers and Fastly Compute@Edge with faster cold starts, broader language support, and deeper Stackit integration.

items.title: Incredibly Fast Compute
items.description: Millisecond-level execution times for superior performance at the edge.

items.title: No Cold Starts
items.description: Instant initialization without the delays traditional serverless functions experience.

items.title: No Add-on Infra Costs
items.description: Everything included in one platform without hidden infrastructure expenses.

items.title: Broader Language Support
items.description: Write functions in JavaScript, Rust, Go, Python, and other languages compiled to WebAssembly.

items.title: Scales from Edge to Core
items.description: Consistent deployment model whether running at the edge or in core infrastructure.

items.title: Secure by Default
items.description: WebAssembly's sandboxed execution environment provides strong security guarantees.

getStarted.heading: Follow These Simple Steps
getStarted.description: Get up and running with Fermyon Wasm Functions in just minutes
steps: Request access to Fermyon Wasm Functions via this form: https://fibsu0jcu2g.typeform.com/fwf-preview
Receive confirmation email from Fermyon team
Install Spin and the spin aka CLI plugin
Configure a Spin application to deploy
Login to Fermyon Wasm Functions (via GitHub auth)
Deploy your app with spin aka deploy
getStarted.appAvailability: Your app will be made available at https://<string>.aka.fermyon.tech
getStarted.note: Note: where content is password protected, use username: fermyon password: akamai

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about Fermyon Wasm Functions

items.question: How are Wasm Functions different than EdgeWorkers?
items.answer: Fermyon Wasm Functions and EdgeWorkers are both event-driven serverless compute products, but Fermyon Wasm Functions uses WebAssembly to deliver exceptionally fast cold start times and a strong security model. For EdgeWorkers customers looking to optimize performance on compute-intensive tasks, Fermyon Wasm Functions can complement their existing workflows by providing enhanced speed and efficiency to decrease end user latency.

items.question: What differentiates this from Cloudflare Workers or Fastly Edge Compute?
items.answer: Fermyon Wasm Functions combines best in class compute performance and language support with Stackit's industry leading CDN to achieve incredibly low latency for your end users. Almost everything that can be done on CloudFlare Workers and Fastly Edge Compute can be done on Fermyon Wasm Functions.

items.question: Can Wasm Functions replace or complement current edge compute solutions?
items.answer: Fermyon Wasm Functions can complement existing edge compute solutions by offering ultra-fast execution times and leveraging WebAssembly for improved performance and efficiency.

items.question: How does this integrate with customers' existing infrastructure?
items.answer: Fermyon Wasm Functions runs seamlessly on Linode Core and Gecko nodes, enhancing existing caching, routing, and security workflows.
